ingredients.item: ½ x 25g pack fresh chives, chopped

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large saucepan and fry the onion and pepper for 2-3 minutes. Cut off the corn kernels with a sharp knife and add to the pan with the stock, bring to a simmer and add the fish pie mix, cover and cook for 5 minutes.
Add the prawns and milk and cook for 2 minutes more until the prawns are pink and cooked through. Stir in the chives and season.
